episodes.title: ‘Doomsday Cult’ Mom Lori Vallow Manipulated Chad Daybell: Defense
episodes.description:
Opening statements started Wednesday morning in the trial of Chad Daybell. Defense Attorney John Prior delivered a statement saying Lori Vallow was a “very sexual, very manipulative person,” who “knows how to get what she wants.“Daybell, the husband of “doomsday cult” mom Lori Vallow Daybell, faces trial for allegedly conspiring with his wife to murder his first wife, Tammy Daybell, as well as two of Lori’s children, Tylee Ryan and Joshua Vallow. Chad Daybell faces multiple charges including first-degree murder and conspiracy to commit first-degree murder. If convicted, Chad Daybell could be sentenced to death.

#ChadDaybell #DoomsdayCult #LawAndCrime

episodes.title: ‘Final Chapter’: Chad Daybell’s Alleged Murders Detailed in ‘Doomsday Cult’ Trial Opening Statement
episodes.description:
After five days of jury selection, opening statements in the trial of Chad Daybell took place Wednesday morning. State Prosecutor Rob Wood delivered a passionate statement to the Idaho court room, emphasizing to the jury, “Your verdict will be the link that writes the final chapter of this saga”. Daybell, the husband of “doomsday cult” mom Lori Vallow Daybell, faces trial for allegedly conspiring with his wife to murder his first wife, Tammy Daybell, as well as two of Lori’s children, Tylee Ryan and Joshua Vallow. Chad Daybell faces multiple charges including first-degree murder and conspiracy to commit first-degree murder. If convicted, Chad Daybell could be sentenced to death.

#ChadDaybell #DoomsdayCult #LawAndCrime
